body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Bruce Walker and I'm a customer service agent at ABC Autos. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Deborah! Can you please give me your phone number as well as your birthdate?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three four, and my birthdate is zero one slash zero five slash one nine eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah! Just to confirm, your phone number is five five five, one two three four, and your birthdate is zero one slash zero five slash one nine eight seven, correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Deborah. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Bruce.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Deborah. Have a great day!
